actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from US Intl Trade Comm.

official_title: A bill to increase the tariff on injection and compression molds made in Canada in order to offset the subsidy provided with respect to such articles by the Canadian Government.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the tariff on injection and compression molds made in Canada.

titles.title: A bill to increase the tariff on injection and compression molds made in Canada in order to offset the subsidy provided with respect to such articles by the Canadian Government.
